item.title: app.SettingsSchema
item.description: app.SettingsSchema # import "fyne.io/fyne/v2/app" Usage # type SettingsSchema # type SettingsSchema struct { // these items are used for global settings load ThemeName string `json:"theme"` Scale float32 `json:"scale"` PrimaryColor string `json:"primary_color"` } SettingsSchema is used for loading and storing global settings func (*SettingsSchema) StoragePath # func (sc *SettingsSchema) StoragePath() string StoragePath returns the location of the settings storage
